content: Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 01 Sep 2019What are the best credit cards for online shopping for groceries?I have a Citi premier mikes card but considering to get one more card for better offers when I shop online for groceries (Redmart, Fairprice). Any recommendations for this?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Aik KaiLevel 6. MasterUpdated on 03 Sep 2019You mile chaser?Get the DBS World Women MasterCard. Give you 4 miles per dollar in the form of DBS points when making online purchases.Note that points expire in 1 year so remember to transfer them out when you are nearing the 1 year mark.Another card would be UOB Preferred Platinum Visa.Same thing as above, 4mpd for online transactions.Cheers2 comments0

Question Poster03 Sep 2019Hi, anything that is not on miles but offers cash back/ rebates?Aik Kai03 Sep 2019You can try UOB One Card. Generous rebates. The other would be OCBC 365. 3% cashback.

Read the review here:
https://seedly.sg/reviews/credit-cards/ocbc-365-cashback
https://seedly.sg/reviews/credit-cards/uob-one-cashback

Would recommend the UOB One though
